verbs.description: rebait (third-person singular simple present rebaits, present participle rebaiting, simple past and past participle rebaited)

entries.meaning: (transitive) To bait again; to readd bait to.
examples: Any fish were gaffed and brought aboard, the hooks rebaited, and the line paid out on the other side. The dory thus went down the whole length of the trawl.
